description:
A boy is born from a peach and beats a demon. A fierce hawk kills animals on a winter mountain, and only a hunter can stop it.  A thunder god falls in love with the owner of a soba stand and marries her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momotarou / The Mountain Bird`s Arrow / The Thunder God That Married the Soba Stand Owner
Momotarou / Yamadori no Ya / Sobaya no Muko ni Natta Kaminari
桃太郎 / 山鳥の矢 / そば屋の婿になった雷
